definition: ocean/sea/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]/great number of people or things/(dialect) numerous

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Hai3 yang2 Shi2 you2 Zong3 gong1 si1
Guang3 dong1 Hai3 yang2 Da4 xue2
hai3 yang2 wen1 cha1 fa1 dian4

definition: United Nations Convention on the Law of the Sea
pinyin: Lian2 he2 guo2 Hai3 yang2 fa3 Gong1 yue1

sentences.english: Her Life Line is a green ocean-plant, forest.
sentences.chinese: 她的生命线是绿色的海洋草木，森林。

sentences.english: If you go to Aberdeen on Hong Kong Island, you will see Ocean Park.
sentences.chinese: 如果你到港岛香港仔，你会看到海洋公园。

sentences.english: Moreover, America's marine "sanctuaries" do not live up to their name.
sentences.chinese: 此外，美国的海洋“禁猎区”名不副实。

sentences.english: HF radar backscatter from the ocean surface shows nonlinearities and time variation of its spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 高频波段海洋回波信号表现了非线性和频谱时变性。

sentences.english: An estimated four thousand types of forams live in the world’s oceans.
sentences.chinese: 据估计，在海洋中生活着4000种有孔虫。

sentences.english: It is also thought to have seen a period of ocean acidification.
sentences.chinese: 但也有人认为可能是出现了某个阶段的海洋酸化。

sentences.english: Blooms also happen in the winter, however, when northeast winds blow offshore.
sentences.chinese: 然而，当冬季东北风吹向海洋时，水华也会出现。

sentences.english: First, optimized the industrial structure of marine fishery; forth, needed to protect ocean ecosystem environment.
sentences.chinese: 一是优化海洋渔业产业结构，二要保护海洋生态环境。

sentences.english: First, optimized the industrial structure of marine fishery; forth, needed to protect ocean ecosystem environment.
sentences.chinese: 一是优化海洋渔业产业结构，二要保护海洋生态环境。

sentences.english: By comparing the two we finally find a suitable ellipse fitting method for the environment of sea.
sentences.chinese: 通过比较找出一种适用于海洋环境的椭圆拟合方法。

sentences.english: Polar bears depend on solid sea ice for survival; it's where they do their hunting.
sentences.chinese: 北极熊在厚厚的海洋冰层上猎食，以此为生。

sentences.english: The appearance of the whale has stunned marine biologists.
sentences.chinese: 这头灰鲸的让海洋生物学家大为吃惊。

sentences.english: With the countless torches lit, with the silent sea of faces and the unbarred heads.
sentences.chinese: 无数火炬燃起，无数脸孔和致哀者汇集的沉默海洋。

sentences.english: Water fills in low areas of the basalt crust to form the world's oceans.
sentences.chinese: 水聚集在玄武岩地壳的低洼处形成了海洋。

sentences.english: This study made an attempt for chaotic anti-control application in the ocean reconnaissance robot.
sentences.chinese: 为混沌反控制在海洋侦察机器人的应用做了尝试。

definition: dry land (as opposed to the sea)
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep
